text: @GavinNewsom If CA’s response to COVID-19 is science based, why are we allowing schools to reopen to full capacity in the fall.  30+ students and their teacher in a small classroom.  Keep in mind CA is releasing prisoners from their confined spaces to prevent the spreading of infection...
